name: Core Space
description:
A space shooter game where you must destroy the core of space bases that will do whathever they can to stop you.

With retro style arcade gaming, Core Space brings you to an universe of action in 2D space combat.

  • Fly freely for each level
  • Destroy different style of bases
  • Fight your way around
  • Improve your space ship
  • Level Editor included!

Important controls:

  • Mouse for aiming
  • [N] for shoot
  • [K] for shoot secondary (if aquired)

NOTE: Read installation instructions please! (it will appears when you download the game)

If you liked it please help me with a donation!
